doc:
Paul Eiding https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Eiding 0 Paul Eiding (born March 28, 1957) is an American actor, voice actor, and voice instructor, best known as the voice actor behind Perceptor in The Transformers, Colonel Roy Campbell in the Metal Gear series, the narrator in Diablo, Judicator Aldaris in StarCraft, and Max Tennyson in Ben 10, Ben 10: Alien Force, Ben 10: Ultimate Alien, and Ben 10 Omniverse where he also did the vocal effects for Zed, Liam and voices for several other characters. He is also known for providing voice work for Fallout 3 and The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim and is the voice of the Vault-Tec Rep from Fallout 4. Paul_Eiding ( born March_28_,_1957 ) is an_American_actor , voice_actor , and voice_instructor , best_known as the_voice_actor behind Perceptor in The_Transformers , Colonel_Roy_Campbell in the_Metal_Gear_series , the_narrator in Diablo , Judicator_Aldaris in StarCraft , and Max_Tennyson in Ben_10 , Ben_10 : Alien_Force , Ben_10 : Ultimate_Alien , and Ben_10_Omniverse where he also did the_vocal_effects for Zed_,_Liam_and_voices for several_other_characters . He is_also_known for providing voice_work for Fallout_3 and The_Elder_Scrolls_V : Skyrim and is the_voice of the_Vault-Tec_Rep from Fallout_4 .
